message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my investment within $10,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?

Hi Bob, I understand your position. While I believe the product is worth significantly more, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $12,000.
